hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

GC Deku Scrub Grotto Right.item: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that King Dodongo dislikes smoke.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ToT (Left).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Ganon's Castle Small Key Ring# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.
